snippet.title: Pharaoh™: A New Era - Reveal trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1351080/Pharaoh_A_New_Era/?beta=1 

Pharaoh™: A New Era is being developed with all-new code and from the ground up from Dotemu and Triskell Interactive and brings all-new 2D graphics with brand new UI and improved mechanics to the game, and will include the 2000 expansion, Cleopatra: Queen of the Nile. 

Packing more than 100 hours of gameplay, Pharaoh features 53 missions and a full map and mission editor, making the classic an immediate must-have for 2021. 

Would-be rulers can keep up with Pharaoh by following Dotemu on Twitter @dotemu and @Triskell_Int

Join the official Discord here: https://discord.gg/MJkd3KJ

Trailer by https://mathematic.tv/

© 2020 Activision Publishing, Inc. PHARAOH is a trademark of Activision Publishing, Inc. Published by Dotemu and Developed by Triskell Interactive with Seaven Studio.

#pharaoh #dotemu #retrogaming
